mapper.select: SELECT fd.diary_id, fd.user_id, fd.crop_id, fd.date, fd.activity_type, fd.content, fd.photo_url, fd.created_at, u.name as user_name, c.crop_name as crop_name FROM FarmingDiary fd LEFT JOIN User u ON fd.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN Crop c ON fd.crop_id = c.crop_id ORDER BY fd.date DESC, fd.created_at DESC
